snippet: Infinitis and Volvos with air-conditioning troubles and Chevrolet Silverados with failing starter motors are among the problems covered in the latest technical service bulletins.
abstract: Automakers release technical service bulletins to service departments and mechanics for Acura, Chevrolet, Ford, Honda, Infiniti, Mazda and Volvo.
lead_paragraph: Infinitis and Volvos with air-conditioning troubles and Chevrolet Silverados with failing starter motors are among the problems covered in the latest technical service bulletins.
